item.title: Research in Reinforcement Learning at Imperial College London
item.description: The UROP is still in progress and the page will be updated! I am working as part of Undergraduate Research Opportunities Program (UROP) at the Information Processing and Communications Lab in Imperial College London. I have worked on privacy aware data sharing for the new generation electricity supply network, using Reinforcement Learning. In the new generation electricity supply networks, smart meters play a key role in recording the electricity consumption of a household and report it to the utility provider in real time.
